00028 #pragma once
00029 
00030 #include <l4/sys/debugger.h>
00031 
00032 namespace L4 {
00033 
00040 class Debugger : public Kobject_t<Debugger, Kobject, L4_PROTO_DEBUGGER>
00041 {
00042   L4_KOBJECT(Debugger)
00043 
00044 public:
00045   enum
00046   {
00047     Switch_log_on  = L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_ON,
00048     Switch_log_off = L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_OFF,
00049   };
00050 
00055   l4_msgtag_t set_object_name(const char *name,
00056                               l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00057   { return l4_debugger_set_object_name_u(cap(), name, utcb); }
00058 
00063   unsigned long global_id(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00064   { return l4_debugger_global_id_u(cap(), utcb); }
00065 
00070   unsigned long kobj_to_id(l4_addr_t kobjp,
00071                            l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00072   { return l4_debugger_kobj_to_id_u(cap(), kobjp, utcb); }
00073 
00078   int query_log_typeid(const char *name, unsigned idx,
00079                       l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00080   { return l4_debugger_query_log_typeid_u(cap(), name, idx, utcb); }
00081 
00086   int query_log_name(unsigned idx,
00087                      char *name, unsigned namelen,
00088                      char *shortname, unsigned shortnamelen,
00089                      l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00090   {
00091     return l4_debugger_query_log_name_u(cap(), idx, name, namelen,
00092                                         shortname, shortnamelen, utcb);
00093   }
00094 
00099   l4_msgtag_t switch_log(const char *name, unsigned on_off,
00100                          l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00101   { return l4_debugger_switch_log_u(cap(), name, on_off, utcb); }
00102 
00107   l4_msgtag_t get_object_name(unsigned id, char *name, unsigned size,
00108                        l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00109   { return l4_debugger_get_object_name_u(cap(), id, name, size, utcb); }
00110 };
00111 }
